name: 陳怡靜
objective:
This course is served international students who come here for studying and understanding Chinese culture and thoughts.
Students need to have been middle level of speaking, listening, reading, and writing Chinese. We had been learned some Chinese traditional fables in the last semester. This semester we are going to study more advanced stories which are with deep culture and thoughts. They will help you understand how Chinese people think.
